Thank you very much for your example, Salvador, you leave a legacy of vision, innovation, frank and transparent communication, and consistency in the inverted pyramid leadership. Thank you for your closeness on all the occasions when we had to coincide, for your words of encouragement for the Talent Development career, for your support and warmth when I received the Inspirational Teacher Award in Querétaro. I had the opportunity to win your book "Your life, your best business" in a competition from SIFE, a student organization of social entrepreneurship; I finished it on a summer vacation and was very inspired by the work I did with the students on leadership. When they chose you I knew we were in excellent hands and as these years passed I feel that it was so. May God bless you and continue inspiring others and sowing dreams for Mexico in this new stage. Luis Gerardo González López (Toluca Campus)
